Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'This looks like the ruins of some form of civilization.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Please proceed carefully. The digging devices are quite high-powered and might cause mini tremors.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "We'll have to pass through it. The target's deep inside somewhere.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'If we engage with any Corrupted, Bianca and I will be the ones to deal with them. The weathered structure of the ruins might not hold for our entire squad.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "I know what to do. You don't need to remind me.", 4: '2'}
{2: "She didn't mean it that way, Karen.", 3: '19'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "I don't know you that well for you to call me that!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'The ceiling is collapsing! Commandant, watch out!', 4: '3'}
